item.title: Michael Burry Posts Unseen 2019 Email From Keith Gill On GameStop, And Reveals How The Company Responded To His Demands
item.description: In a 2019 email, Burry urged the company to announce a share buyback program, given his estimate of the cash the company had.

item.title: Bitcoin Could Rally Toward $100,000 – CIFR, WULF ‘Impressive’ After Crypto Sell-Off, Analyst Reportedly Says
item.description: In a note to clients, BTIG reportedly said short-term crypto flows remain sensitive to macro data and shifting risk appetite.

item.title: CRCL Stock Rises After Half-Billion USDC Mint On Solana Following Tether Downgrade
item.description: Circle completed two large USDC mints totaling $500 million on the Solana network, according to Arkham Intelligence data.

item.title: Michael Burry Shares His Formative Investing Journey: ‘Great Companies Can Be Missed For A Long Period Of Time’
item.description: ‘The Big Short’ investor has started a Substack newsletter, where he plans to share his growing concerns and outlook on artificial intelligence.

item.title: Vanda Pharmaceuticals Says FDA Will Take More Time To Decide On Tradipitant Clinical Hold Re-Review
item.description: The FDA was initially expected to complete the re-review on November 26 and has since then extended it to December 5.
